Interface Fraction

public interface Fraction

Fraction is an interface for objects that represent rational numbers as fractions.

Version:
January 19, 2011
Author:
Xu, Runbo and Zurn, Andrew

Method Summary
 Fraction addToThis(Fraction addend)
          A method that will add the expressed number to the fraction.
 Fraction divideThisBy(Fraction divisor)
          A method that will divide the expressed number by the fraction.
Precondition:The divisor must be a number greater than or less than zero.
 boolean equals(Object other)
          A method to check the equality of two objects.
Precondition:Niether objects can be null.
Postcondition:Will return true if the objects are equivalent, or false if not equivalent.
 Integer getDenominator()
          A method to return as an integer, the demoninator of a fraction
 Integer getNumerator()
          A method to return as an integer, the numerator of the fraction.
 Fraction multiplyThisBy(Fraction multiplier)
          A method that will multiply the expressed number by the fraction.
 Fraction subtractFromThis(Fraction subtrahend)
          A method that will subtract the expressed number from the fraction.

Parameters:

divideThisBy

Fraction divideThisBy(Fraction divisor)
                      throws DivideByZeroRuntimeException
A method that will divide the expressed number by the fraction.
Precondition:The divisor must be a number greater than or less than zero.

Parameters:
divisor - The number to be used to divide by.
Throws:
DivideByZeroRuntimeException - If divisor is zero.

A method to check the equality of two objects.
Precondition:Niether objects can be null.
Postcondition:Will return true if the objects are equivalent, or false if not equivalent.
